Quote-Answer: You are in the royal banquet. You are really bored and want to do something different. What will you do to liven things up?
Call the alchemists to create some strange lights and smokes. What could go wrong?
Call the castle guards to the party. They deserve it.
Give the leftovers to the commoners. It is better than to give to the pigs... I think.
Call the pope to praise our dear Lord and give us his blessings.
